name: logistics-platform
description: Comprehensive logistics management platform built with Spring Boot microservices

scripts.health-check: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); const services = [8080, 8081, 8082, 8083]; services.forEach(port => { exec('curl -s http://localhost:' + port + '/actuator/health', (err, stdout) => { console.log('Port ' + port + ':', err ? 'DOWN' : JSON.parse(stdout).status); }); });"

author: Logistics Platform Team
